component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command. Commands that include a name or password are case-sensitive.***
component.existingcommands:
This Syntax Checker activity reviews basic switch configurations.
Configure the switch hostname to be 'HQSw1'.

command.instruction: Configure the encrypted privileged EXEC password to 'class'.
Set all line passwords to 'cisco' and require a login, starting with the console. Set vty lines 0 through 15.
Exit to global configuration mode. Enter the command to encrypt the plain text passwords.
Configure VLAN 1 with the IP address 192.168.10.2/24 and activate the interface.

command.deviceresponse: %LINK-5-CHANGED: Interface Vlan1, changed state to up
command.instruction: Return directly to privileged EXEC mode and display the current configuration.

command.deviceresponse:
Building configuration...

Current configuration : 1178 bytes
!
version 12.2
no service timestamps log datetime msec
no service timestamps debug datetime msec
service password-encryption
!
hostname HQSw1
!
enable secret 5 $1$mERr$9cTjUIEqNGurQiFU.ZeCi1
!
!
< output omitted >
!
!
interface Vlan1
ip address 192.168.10.2 255.255.255.0
!
!
line con 0
password 7 0822455D0A16
login
!
line vty 0 4
password 7 0822455D0A16
login
line vty 5 15
password 7 0822455D0A16
login
!
!
end
HQSw1#
command.instruction: You successfully completed the basic switch configurations on switch HQSw1.
